title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9500.1 - Statutory authority and purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9500.1 - Statutory authority and purpose

State Regulations

The Natural Heritage Trust is a public benefit corporation
established by chapter 653 of the Laws of 1968. Its purposes and powers can be
found in article 55 of the Arts and Cultural Affairs Law. Section
2880
of
the Public Authorities Law, which was enacted by chapter 183 of the Laws of
1987, requires public benefit corporations to promulgate rules and regulations
detailing their policies with regard to making prompt payment to
contractors. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9500.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
